sys_script_include.name: WS1GGetUemAction

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_f46e8e651bb67850a76c0dc0604bcbdd
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_vmw_ws1uem.WS1GGetUemAction</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>WS1GGetUemAction</name><script><![CDATA[/**
Query and Update methods for obtaining 
choice field values for a dropdown menu item.
Called by guided setup to update the action items
accessible by the app for different roles.
**/

var WS1GGetUemAction = Class.create();
WS1GGetUemAction.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    get_value:function() {
        var action_table;
        var value = "";
        var inactive = "";
        var return_value = [];
        var json_obj;
        var answer;

        action_table = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');

        action_table.addQuery('element', 'x_vmw_ws1uem_ws1action');
        action_table.query();

        return_value = [];
        while (action_table.next()) {
            value = action_table.getValue("value");
            inactive = action_table.getValue("inactive");

            json_obj =  JSON.stringify({"value" : value, "inactive" : inactive});

            return_value.push(json_obj);
        }

        answer = JSON.stringify(return_value);

//        gs.info("WS1GetUemAction return value " + answer);

        return answer;
    } ,

set_value:function() {
    var newValue;
    var action_table;
    var actionType = this.getParameter("sysparm_actiontype");
//    gs.info("WS1GetUemAction set action type " + actionType);

    newValue = this.getParameter("sysparm_new_value");

    action_table = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
    action_table.addQuery("element", "x_vmw_ws1uem_ws1action");
    action_table.addQuery("value", actionType);
    action_table.query();

    while (action_table.next()) {
        action_table.inactive = newValue;
        action_table.update();
        return true;
    }
},
   _privateFunction: function() { // this function is not client callable     
    }
 });]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-24 18:47:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>f46e8e651bb67850a76c0dc0604bcbdd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>WS1GGetUemAction</sys_name><sys_package display_value="VMware Workspace ONE ITSM Connector" source="x_vmw_ws1uem">b110a7a11b12b41092ce8514604bcb28</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="VMware Workspace ONE ITSM Connector">b110a7a11b12b41092ce8514604bcb28</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f46e8e651bb67850a76c0dc0604bcbdd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-24 03:31:05</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
